meanings.definition: A medical procedure in which a flexible tube with a light and camera is used to examine the inside of the body.
meanings.sent1: During the endoscopy, the doctor looked inside my stomach with a special tube.
meanings.sent2: The endoscopy revealed the cause of the stomach pain.
meanings.sent3: The endoscopy felt like a tiny spaceship exploring my insides.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like endoscopies, seeing through every lie I told.
meanings.sent5: The endoscopy illuminated the dark mysteries of my body.

meanings.definition: The act of performing an endoscopy.
meanings.sent1: She was trained in endoscopy and performed the procedure with precision.
meanings.sent2: The endoscopy went smoothly without any complications.
meanings.sent3: The endoscopy dance routine at the talent show was a hit!
meanings.sent4: His investigation skills were like an endoscopy, uncovering every detail.
meanings.sent5: The endoscopy of the play revealed the hidden talents of the actors.
